title: Science meets industry - why are many innovative coating technologies never entering the market?
segmentation: So welcome also from my side.
My name is Simona Shooter and I'm working at Evonik.
I'm very happy to be here a little bit.
The connection between the industry and the science.
I worked for research institutes for I think 14 or 15 years and since now eight years I'm in the industry so I think I know quite well aware.
So I know both words and so I hope I can be there.
A link to put them more together.
In the future, and I think I'm which is a good starting point for that.

Be 3 GmbH is.
